sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: Thank you for using this program. I wish, you will use this program from today to tomorrow and day after tomorrow. The LCS is software of calculate a Longest Common Subsequence by a dynamic programing. For Nucleotide and an Amino acid sequence.

sect2.title: Running from a commandline
sect2.para: The LCS have GUI(Graphical user interface) and CUI(Character user interface). Default GUI.

sect3.title: Read sequences
sect3.para: By this section, I will instruct about a easy way to use by GUI. This software have a user interface of a standard GUI. The LCS can use a fasta format file and a only sequence file. And copy & paste from other window. A upper text view area is a source data area, and a lower text view area is a target data area. A source data mean find a target sequence in a source seuence. I designed for copy & paste. But you can use menu, toolbar and drag & drop.

listitem.para: Compare a part of sequence – default
Pre-scan by identity match for a part of sequence mode.
Pre-scan by Hidden Markov Model for a part of sequence mode.
An Affine gap score, this can set a number of integer number - default 5
A Liner gap score, this can set a number of integer number - default 10
A Integer number of match - default 10
A Integer number of unmatch - default -10

sect3.title: Execute
sect3.para: You will push to "Execute" button, and calculate alignment.

sect1.title: Parameters
sect1.para: The LCS have a few parameters. that a compare type, a compare mode, an alignment mode, a gap penalty, a number of gap penalty, a number of match, unmatch.

listitem.para: Compare to an amino acide and an amino acide.
Compare to an all sequence and an all sequence.
Compare to part of sequence and part of sequence.
Pre-scan type. This is for a part of sequence mode.
Nuber of unmatch. default 10, that is minus 10.

sect1.title: No,ID,SCR
sect1.para: Common means "No", "ID", "SCR" is number, identitiy, score.

listitem.para: "No" is used a sequence number in source.
"ID" is a identity source and target sequence.
"SCR" is score, case of nucleotide that a summary of match(1). case of an amino acid that summary of a blosum number.

sect1.title: Chromatography
sect1.para: Chromatography is display to an allocated sequence by a color separated graph.

listitem.para: Case of nucleotide is cyan or a yellow green. cyan is 0(unmatch), a yellow green is 1(match).
Case of an amino acid is from yellow, green to blue, purple. Number of blosum 15(top) is yellow, green is 8, cyan is 0, blue is -8, purple is -15(under).

sect1.title: Report
sect1.para: Report is display to a detail of allocated sequence. that is number, a source sequence, gap, match, unmatch, insertion, deletion, a target sequence, an allocated sequence and an allocation parameter.
From left side, 1.No 2.source sequence 3.match type 4.target sequence 5.allocated sequence 6.allocation parameter. Match type is match '=', insertion '+', deletion '-', gap '|'

sect1.title: Matrix
sect1.para: Matrix is display to an allocated sequence by a dot matrix plot(harr plot). Dot is a plus number of allocated.
X axis is a source sequence. Y axis is a target sequence.
